Burst.help: Quickly fires a Burst of rounds at a single target at very long range. Damage is average, but the fire rate is fast. Can also reduce the target's defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Burst.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT (Toxic), Foe -DEF
Burst.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

Slug.help: Fires a single Slug at a targeted foe. Firing a single Slug is slower than firing a Burst, but deals more damage, is longer range, and can knock down foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Slug.shortHelp: Ranged, High DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT (Toxic), Foe Knockback

Buckshot.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT (Toxic), Foe Knockback

M30_Grenade.help: Launches a Grenade at long range from beneath the barrel of your Assault Rifle. This explosion affects all within the blast radius, and can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
M30_Grenade.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Lethal/Smash), Minor DoT (Toxic), Knockback

Single_Shot.help: You fire a single blast from your beam rifle, causing energy damage and lowering your target's regeneration rate. There is also a chance that you will knock your target down.
Single_Shot.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DMG (Energy), -Regen (Foe) Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Charged_Shot.help: You charge up your beam rifle and fire a concentrated blast of energy at a single target. This causes energy damage and lowers your target's recovery. There is also a chance that your target may be knocked down.
Charged_Shot.shortHelp: Ranged, High DMG(Energy), -Rec (Foe), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Cutting_Beam.help: You fire a constant stream of energy from your weapon, sweeping it in a broad arc to blast all foes in a wide cone in front of you. This causes energy damage and lowers the defense of affected targets. There is a chance that your target will continue to suffer energy damage briefly after the initial burst of energy damage.
Cutting_Beam.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Energy), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Minor DoT (Energy)
Cutting_Beam.targetHelp: Your defenses have been reduced. There is a chance you may also be suffering energy damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.

Piercing_Beam.help: You fire a supercharged beam of energy in a narrow cone that pierces up to 3 enemies. Each affected enemy suffers energy damage and reduced resistance to all forms of damage. There is also a chance that there is an additional burst of energy that causes extra energy damage on a target.
Piercing_Beam.shortHelp: Ranged (Narrow Cone), High DMG (Energy), -RES (Foe, All), Chance for Moderate DMG (Energy)
Piercing_Beam.targetHelp: Your resistance to all forms of damage has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Crushing_Field.help: Creates a large gravitational field strong enough to Immobilize multiple foes. Crushing Field can also bring down flying entities. Slower and less damaging than Crush, but can capture multiple targets. Crushing Field deals Smashing damage over time and can Slow the movement of targets that escape its grasp. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Crushing_Field.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Smash), Foe Immobilize, -Fly
Crushing_Field.targetHelp: You are being Crushed. You cannot move or fly.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

Singularity.help: You can create a very powerful Gravitational Singularity. The Singularity will engage your foes, assaulting them with various gravity powers. Any foes that attempt to approach the Singularity will be violently hurled away. The Singularity cannot be healed, but is highly resistant to all forms of damage and nearly impervious to Controlling type powers. Recharge: Very Long

12_Gauge.help: Good at medium range. Longer range and more deadly than most Shotguns, The 12 Gauge Shotgun Fires a cone of buckshot pellets and can knock some foes down.

Family_Bonds.help: You mend the wounds of yourself and nearby allies by placing your bodies in a past or future state where they are far less injured. Temporal Mending will immediately heal its targets and continue to heal them for an equal amount over the next 6 seconds. Additionally, affected allies will gain some resistance to slow effects and regeneration debuffs. Allies affected by the Accelerated effect will receive additional healing from this power. Temporal Mending will apply a regeneration bonus instead of heal over time for a short while if the user is in a PvP zone. Recharge: Long
Family_Bonds.shortHelp: PBAoE, Heal (Self and Allies), HoT (Self and Allies), +RES(Slow, Regen Debuff)

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} health with {PowerName}.
{PlayerSource} continually heals you for {Damage} health with {PowerName}.

Snap_Shot.help: The cannon fires a single, armor piercing explosive round sheathed in an energy field to punch through shields.
Snap_Shot.targetHelp: Your resistance to damage has been reduced from the auto-cannon.

HE_Shot.shortHelp: Targeted AoE, Moderate DMG(Lethal/Smashing), Minor DoT (Energy), Minor DoT(Fire)
HE_Shot.targetHelp: You are continuing to burn from the plasma fire.

Targeting_Drone.help: When this small device is activated, the small Targeting Drone hovers around your head and emits targeting laser sights. The lasers can dramatically improve your chance to hit and increase your Perception, allowing you to better see stealthy foes. Targeting Drone also grants you resistance to powers that DeBuff your chance to hit. While in use, any sniper rifle shots you make will do additional damage. This is a toggle power and must be activated and deactivated manually. Like all toggle powers, while active, the Targeting Drone drains Endurance. Recharge: Slow
Targeting_Drone.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} increases your chance to hit.

Training.help: You have a greater tolerance to pain than others. You are also slightly resistant to all types of damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Assault_Strike.help: You deliver a pair of lightning fast blows to your opponent in an effort to throw them off balance, causing smashing damage. This attack can also bruise your target, reducing their defenses.

Agile_Cross.help: You execute a sweeping right hook that can strike multiple targets in your frontal arc. This attack will cause smashing damage. The force of the attack causes trauma, which causes minor lethal damage and reduced regeneration and recovery rates.
Agile_Cross.shortHelp: Melee (Cone), High DMG (Smashing), Minor DoT (Toxic), Chance for -Regen(Foe), -Rec(Foe)
Agile_Cross.targetHelp: You are affected by trauma and are suffering internal bleeding. Your regeneration and recovery are reduced.

Foot_Stomp.help: Heroes can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.
Foot_Stomp.targetHelp: Heroes can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.

Frag_Grenade.help: The explosion from the Fragmentation Grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.
Frag_Grenade.targetHelp: The explosion from the Fragmentation Grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.

Agile_Sweep.help: You quickly strike your opponent from a defensive position, causing smashing damage. The force of the blow also has a chance to slow their response time. Additionally, your chance to hit and your defense against melee and smashing attacks is increased for a short time.
Agile_Sweep.shortHelp: Melee, Minor DMG(Smashing), +DEF(Self, Melee, Smashing), +ToHit(Self), Chance for -Rech(Foe)
Agile_Sweep.targetHelp: Your attack speed has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
Your attack speed has been reduced by {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Crushing_Blow.help: You swing your weapon at your target with tremendous force. The blow causes smashing damage and internal trauma, which causes lethal damage over time. The target also suffers a reduction in movement speed and ability to fly.
Crushing_Blow.targetHelp: You are bleeding internally. Your movement speed and your ability to fly have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
You are temporarily unable to fly due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Shockwave_Strike.help: You swing your weapon in a wide arc and create a shockwave which travels in the direction of your target. Opponents hit by the shockwave suffer smashing damage. Targets may also be knocked back and suffer a brief reduction in their regeneration and recovery.
Shockwave_Strike.targetHelp: You have been knocked back and suffer exhaustion, reducing your regeneration and recovery.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Overpower.help: You channel your energy into an especially powerful swing. This swing does significant smashing damage and causes sufficient trauma to induce lethal damage due to internal bleeding.
Overpower.shortHelp: Melee, Superior DMG (Smashing), Moderate DoT (Lethal), Chance for Knockup(Foe), -Fly(Foe)
Overpower.targetHelp: You have been knocked back and suffer exhaustion, reducing your regeneration and recovery.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Shatter_Armor.help: You batter your enemy with your weapon, causing significant smashing damage and temporarily debilitating their defenses and resistances.
Shatter_Armor.targetHelp: Your defenses and resistances have been decreased.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Painless.help: You have learned techniques from the Family which make you more resilient to pain and able to take more punishment before being defeated. When activated, you will gain a long boost to your maximum HP, a significant self heal and have a chance to boost your recovery and regeneration.

Arc_of_Devastation.help: You swing your weapon in a powerful arc which deals smashing damage to all in the way. There is also a chance that the target may be knocked down and stunned. If stunned, the opponent will also suffer reductions in attack speed and recharge rate.
Arc_of_Devastation.shortHelp: Melee (Cone), High DMG(Smashing), Chance for Knockback(Foe), Stun(Foe), -Rech(Foe), -ToHit(Foe)
Arc_of_Devastation.targetHelp: Your attack speed and chance to hit have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

Business_Time.help: You have learned techniques from the Family which they call, 'it's Business Time'. When activated, you will gain resistance to all types of damage, increased Recovery and resistance to Knock, Repel, Sleep, Stun, Immobilization and Hold effects.
Business_Time.shortHelp: +RES(Self,All), +DEF(Self, All), +Rec(Self,All), Resistant to Knock, Repel, Sleep, Stun, Immobilize, Hold
